name: Ext_R5_MedicationRequest_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationRequest.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Reason or indication for ordering or not ordering the medication
element.definition: The reason or the indication for ordering or not ordering the medication.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationRequest.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationRequest.reason` maps to R4B `MedicationRequest.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
